dct_title_s: Map of India and adjacent countries
dct_description_sm: Inset of Malaya peninsula.; Inset: orographic features -- vegetation and principal minerals -- density of population, etc.; Relief shown by shading and heights in feet.; Shows: international and administrative boundaries, railways (3 categories), roads, shipping routes.
124 x 140 centimeters, on sheets 73 x 80 centimeters
